mapper.select: SELECT ShoppingCartID, ItemID, CustomerID, ShoppingCount, Status, (CASE Status WHEN 'I' THEN '待支付' WHEN 'S' THEN '已提交' WHEN 'D' THEN '已删除' WHEN 'P' THEN '已支付' WHEN 'E' THEN '已过期' END) AS StatusText, InUser, DATE_FORMAT(InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM ShoppingCart WHERE CustomerID=#{arg0} AND Status = 'I' ORDER BY InDate DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ShoppingCart ( ItemID, CustomerID, ShoppingCount, Status, InUser, LastEditUser ) VALUES ( #{itemID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shoppingCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastEditUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ShoppingCart SET ItemID = #{itemID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CustomerID = #{customerID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, ShoppingCount = #{shoppingCount, jdbcType=INTEGER}, Status = #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LastEditUser = #{lastEditUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ShoppingCartID = #{shoppingCartID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
